title: Vegan Meal Plan
shortDescription: A site to save your recipes and see other people's recipes!
fullDescription: A website where you can register and save all your recipes, you can also create a meal plan for your week and easily make your shopping list! In this project I did all the Backend and Frontend.

title: Developer Run
shortDescription: A game created during my first project at the Bootcamp
fullDescription: A Mario style game where you need to pass the 3 levels to finish. The game was created using Javascript and Canvas.

title: Iron Library
shortDescription: The Projects Library is a collection of project plans and documentation that can be used by future students as a resource for ideas and inspiration.
fullDescription: The library is organized into three sections: Web Development, UX/UI and Data Analytics. Each section contains a variety of projects that have been created by current and past students! This project was created using Node and Handlebars

title: Splash Page - Responsive
shortDescription: An initial page to get some data from the user
fullDescription: A splash page is a page that precedes the main pages on your website. The purpose of a splash page varies: You can promote a new offer, show a disclaimer, or require visitors to verify information. In this page I used HTML and CSS to create a completely responsive Splash Page

title: Buraco ScoreBoard
shortDescription: A scoreboard to store your points when playing the famous Brazilian game called Buraco
fullDescription: In this project, I worked with HTML, CSS and JavaScript to create a scoreboard for the game called Buraco. In it you can store yours and yours opponent points, and at the end you can start a new scoreboard

title: Oldagram
fullDescription: In this project, I worked with HTML, CSS and JavaScript to create an instagram clone. It used a loop to iterate and show all the people in an array.

title: Password Generator
fullDescription: In this project, I worked with HTML, CSS and JavaScript to create a password generator. In it you can choose the size between 5 and 15 digits and generate a random password!
